column2: "Jakɛ ne ba Agur
column3: ne nsɛm; Nkɔnhyɛsɛm no. Ɔbarimba no ka kyerɛ Itiel

column2: "Ampaara dɛ mayɛ mbowadze asen nyimpa biara
column3: Nna minnyi nyimpa ne ntseasee:"

column2: "Na munnsuaa nyansa
column3: Eso minnyi Krɔnkrɔnnyi no ho nyimdzee."

column2: "Woana na ɔafow akɔ ɔsor
column3: na ɔasan esian? Woana na ɔaboaboa mframa ano ekitsa? Woana na ɔabɔ nsu boa wɔ n'atar ano? Woana na ɔdze asaase ano nyinara etsintsim hɔ? Ne dzin dze dɛn
column4: na ne ba ne dzin dze dɛn

column2: "Nyankopɔn n'asɛm biara wɔasɔ ahwɛ: Ɔyɛ kyɛm ma hɔn a wɔdze hɔn werɛ hyɛ no mu no."
"Mma mmfa biribi nnka ne nsɛm ho
column3: Amma ɔaannka w'enyim

column2: "Ndzɛmba ebien na mebisa no wo hɔ; Mma mmfa nnkam me ansaana mewu."
"Yi egyangyandze na atorsɛm fi me nkyɛn koraa: Mma mma me ohia anaa ahonya; Edziban a mihia ara na fa nyɛn me."
"Amma maammee
column3: na mammpa wo
column5: EWURADZE so nye woana? Anaa menndzi hia
column7: Na menngu me Nyankopɔn ne dzin ho fi."

column2: "Mma nnsɛɛ akowaa nnkyerɛ no wura
column3: Ɔno ɔbɔdom wo

column2: "Ebusuasantsen bi wɔ hɔ a wɔdom hɔn egya
column3: Na wonnhyira hɔn na."

column2: "Ebusuasantsen bi wɔ hɔ a hɔn ho tsew hɔnara hɔn enyiwa do
column3: Naaso nna wɔnnhohor hɔnho mmfii hɔn efifidze ho."

column2: "Ebusuasantsen bi wɔ hɔ
column3: ao mbrɛ hɔn enyi dua tra hɔn ntɔn a! Na hɔn enyisoatsɛw amema do."

column2: "Ebusuasantsen bi wɔ hɔ a hɔn se ayeyɛ dɛ nkrantsee na hɔn adadaw mu se ayeyɛ dɛ asekan
column3: Dɛ wɔdze bɔwe abɔbɔfo efi asaase do

column2: "Esukun wɔ mbabaa beenu a wɔkeka mu dɛ
column3: Fa ma me
column4: fa ma me. Ndzɛmba ebiasa na wɔwɔ hɔ a wɔmmee ara da

column2: "Adakamona; na yafun bɔnyin; Asaase a nsu mmee no; Na ogya a ɔnnse dɛ
column3: Ayɛ yie"

column2: "Enyiwa a osi n'egya atwetwe
column3: Na obu ne na hɔ setsie enyimtsia no

column2: "Ndzɛmba ebiasa na wɔwɔ hɔ a wɔyɛ me nwanwa dodow
column3: Nyew

column2: "Ɔkɔr no kwan wɔ wimu; Abowatsena no kwan wɔ ɔbotan do; Nsuhɛn no kwan wɔ po mu; Na ɔbarimba no kwan wɔ akataasia ho."
"Mbrɛ ɔbaa awartofo no kwan tse ara nye no; Odzidzi
column3: na ɔpepa n'ano

column2: "Ndzɛmba ebiasa ntsi na asaase wosow
column3: Nyew

column2: "Akowaa a oebedzi hen ntsi; Na ɔkwasea a oedzidzi amee;"
"Ɔbaa a onnyi ɔpɛfo na oenya kun; Na abaawa a odzi no wuraba adze."
"Ndzɛmba anan wɔ hɔ a wosusuar wɔ asaase do
column3: Naaso wɔyɛ enyansafo ara mbordo:"

column2: "Mpataakowa yɛ kuw bi a hɔn ho nnyɛ dzen
column3: Naaso wosiesie hɔn edziban wɔ ɔhyewber mu;"

column2: "Twambowa yɛ mbowa a wɔyɛ mberɛw
column3: Naaso wɔyɛ hɔn adan wɔ abotan mu;"

column2: "Mbɛbɛw nnyi ɔhen
column3: Naaso hɔn nyinara wɔnam ekuwekuw mu kɔ;"

column2: "Ɔketsew a wotum dze nsa suo no mu
column3: Naaso ɔwɔ ahemfie."

column2: "Ndzɛmba ebiasa na wɔwɔ hɔ a wɔkyea wɔ nantsew mu
column3: Ampaara
column4: baanan na hɔn kɔsu yɛ fɛw:"

column2: "Ogyata a ɔyɛ mbowa nyinara mu ɔkatakyi
column3: Na ɔnndan mmfi obiara enyim no;"

column2: "Ɔsapɔnkɔ a n'asen emia; apɔnkyenyin so; Na ɔhen a obi nntsew no do etua."
"Sɛ ayɛ nkwaseadze na ama woho do
column3: Anaa sɛ adwen ebusudze ho a
column4: Ɔno fa wo nsa mua w'ano."

column2: "Na numfonsu no bɔ na ɔma buter
column3: Na hwen ne minkyimii na ɔma bɔgya: Dɛmara so na ebufuhyɛ ɔma aperper."
